name: Distro
headline: The AI co-pilot for sales reps at industrial wholesale distributors.
description: Distro is the all-in-one AI-powered sales platform for counter staff and inside sales at industrial wholesale distributors (HVAC/R, plumbing, electrical, and more).
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:manufacturing; industry:supply-chain; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Jason Sullivan, Founder
founders.description:
Jason is the founder and CEO of Distro, the all-in-one AI co-pilot for counter staff and inside sales at industrial wholesale distributors. He is a repeat founder, having previously co-founded Vested. Before Vested, he was CTO at Elementus, Tech Lead at Coatue, and Senior Software Engineer at PeerIQ. In a prior life, Jason was a credit derivatives trader.

Jason holds an MS in Computer Science from Stanford and a BA in Cognitive Science from Yale.

# The point-of-sale AI for distributor counter staff and inside sales
Distro is the holistic AI platform designed to supercharge your counter reps and inside sales reps. With our AI-powered product suite, your reps can quote more, convert more, and capture more margin per order, all while providing a superior customer experience and keeping your dealers happy.
[Get started](https://distro.app/<#get-started>)[Learn more](https://distro.app/<#learn-more>)
## Powering leading wholesale distributors across industries
Electrical
Plumbing
CommercialHVAC
Electrical
Plumbing
CommercialHVAC
MRO
Residential HVAC
CommercialRefrigeration
Electrical
Plumbing
CommercialRefrigeration
CommercialHVAC
Electrical
Plumbing
CommercialHVAC
Electrical
Plumbing
What we do
## Empowering Sales Reps with AI
Distro seamlessly and securely integrates with your ERP and other internal systems, as well as our proprietary industry dataset, to power AI software tailor-made for your distribution business’s needs. Our platform capabilities range from internal- and external-facing chatbots, to automated quoting workflows, to custom AI solutions and beyond.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f24b/65ef417bea94f586b5ba6ebf_distro-diagram-desktop.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f24b/65ef43b0af68c0c38adc4775_distro-diagram-mobile.png)
![Preview of RepBot by Distro](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f24b/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f27c_Repbot.jpg)
## Distro RepBot
Unlock the full potential of your counter and insides sales reps with RepBot. This AI-driven internal chatbot offers immediate, conversational access to an extensive set of internal and external data and functionality, allowing reps to instantly get product, customer, and transactional information. RepBot empowers your reps with the knowledge they need to serve your customers more effectively.
###### Use Cases
- Cross-referencing- Product catalog/PIM information- Price and availability- Customer information- Quote/Order history- Ask questions of company knowledge base training materials- Initiate a quote
[Learn more](https://distro.app/<#get-started>)
![Preview of CustomerBot by Distro](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f24b/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f27f_Contractorbot.jpg)
## Distro CustomerBot
Enhance your e-commerce experience by embedding CustomerBot on your site. This external-facing chatbot is designed to provide your contractor customers with instant access to order details, shipment scheduling, distributor information, and personalized product recommendations. CustomerBot also facilitates quick and easy quote requests, ensuring a seamless customer experience.
###### Use Cases
- Distributor information (locations, hours, contact info)- Product replacements (enter a model number, get alternatives)- Check order status- Change order header details (shipping address, delivery date)- Request a quote
[Learn more](https://distro.app/<#get-started>)
![Preview of AutoBid by Distro](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f24b/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f27b_autobid.jpg)
## Distro AutoBid
Revolutionize how you handle inbound bid lists and purchase orders with AutoBid. AutoBid seamlessly integrates with any data source, deciphering documents in any format—from raw emails and Excel files, to PDFs and handwritten notes. With our advanced product matching and recommendation algorithm, AutoBid crafts accurate quotes and interfaces directly with your ERP and customers, streamlining the approval process.
###### Use Cases
- Automatically process inbound bid lists/POs/RFQs- Handle any format (pdf, excel, csv, docx, photo of handwritten note, raw email or sms)- Match products via AI engine and draft quote- Easy submission to ERP and customer for approval
[Learn more](https://distro.app/<#get-started>)
![Preview of QuoteTech by Distro](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f24b/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f27d_Asset%20Frame-1.jpg)
## Distro QuoteTech
Transform technical sales quoting with QuoteTech. Tailored for complex sales like commercial refrigeration and HVAC systems, this tool automates the quoting process. Customize questionnaires, engage contractors through dynamic forms or chatbots, and leverage our unique product matching algorithm to generate precise quotes, submitted directly to your ERP and customers.
###### Use Cases
- Automate technical sales processes like commercial refrigeration and commercial HVAC replacements- Automate contractor questionnaire, load calculation and submittal processes- Match products via AI engine and draft quote- Easy submission to ERP and customer for approval
[Learn more](https://distro.app/<#get-started>)
![Preview of Ai Solutions by Distro](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f24b/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f27e_ai-solutions.jpg)
## Custom AI Solutions
Discover the power of AI with Distro’s Custom AI Solutions. Our team is dedicated to understanding your distribution business's unique challenges and opportunities. We develop bespoke AI solutions that are perfectly aligned with your goals, driving efficiency and innovation in your operations.
[Learn more](https://distro.app/<#get-started>)
About us
## AI, Purpose-Built for Distributors
Distro is a response to the growing need for AI-powered software solutions in an industry that is crucial to the global economy: industrial wholesale distribution. With an initial focus on counter reps and inside sales reps, Distro’s mission is to leverage cutting-edge AI technology to empower every participant in the distribution ecosystem to be 10x more productive.
![Distro Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f24b/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f279_logo.png)
Distro has revolutionized the way our sales team operates. With their AI-powered platform, we have been able to quote more accurately and convert leads at a much higher rate. It has truly transformed our business.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/6243807090316203124aee66_placeholder-image.svg)
John Doe
CTO
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f24b/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f277_logo-webflow.svg)
"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Suspendisse varius enim in eros elementum tristique. Duis cursus, mi quis viverra ornare, eros dolor interdum nulla, ut commodo diam libero vitae erat."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/6243807090316203124aee66_placeholder-image.svg)
Name Surname
Position, Company name
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f24b/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f277_logo-webflow.svg)
## Frequently Asked Questions
How does Distro ensure the security of our data?
At Distro, we prioritize your data security above all. Our platform is built on state-of-the-art encryption and security protocols to safeguard your sensitive information. We adhere to industry-leading standards and undergo regular security audits to ensure your data's integrity, confidentiality, and availability. Our commitment extends to comprehensive data protection measures designed to protect against unauthorized access, data breaches, and loss.
What kind of customer support does Distro offer?
Distro provides reliable customer support tailored to your needs. Our comprehensive onboarding process includes training carefully tailored to your team members’ needs and experience levels. Our support team is accessible via email and phone during business hours, ready to assist with any questions or issues you may encounter.
Can you tell us about your team's expertise in AI and machine learning?
Our team at Distro comprises leading AI and machine learning experts with extensive experience in developing advanced solutions for distributors. Our specialists have backgrounds in AI research, data science, and industry-specific knowledge, enabling us to deliver cutting-edge, purpose-built AI tools. We continuously invest in training and research to stay at the forefront of AI technology.
How does Distro's AI adapt to our specific business needs?
Distro's AI solutions are designed with flexibility and customization at their core. Our platforms learn from your data, adapting to your business processes and evolving needs. We work closely with you to understand your unique challenges and tailor our AI models to offer solutions that not only meet but exceed your expectations. This bespoke approach ensures our AI-driven tools seamlessly integrate with your operations, providing targeted, effective support.
What makes Distro different from other AI-focused technology companies?
Distro stands out by focusing exclusively on the needs of distributors. Unlike generic AI solutions, our products are developed with the specific challenges and opportunities of the distribution industry in mind. Our in-depth understanding of your sector, combined with our AI expertise, allows us to offer unparalleled insights and efficiencies. Furthermore, our commitment to data security, continuous innovation, and scalable solutions ensures we deliver value that truly makes a difference to your distribution business.
![Backed by Y Combinator](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65dbf71232c9b5e242e3f24b/664a56cb4ad00af63f5e6c1d_Black.svg)
### Experience the powerof DISTRO today.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Distro**

Distro is an innovative software startup tailored specifically for the industrial wholesale distribution sector. Founded in 2022 and currently part of the Y Combinator Batch S24, Distro aims to enhance the effectiveness of sales reps through artificial intelligence, establishing itself as the go-to AI co-pilot for those working in industries like HVAC/R, plumbing, and electrical distribution. With a team of just seven based in Palo Alto, Distro is making big strides in empowering counter staff and inside sales teams. 

**Mission**

Distro's mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to leverage cutting-edge AI technology to make sales representatives at industrial wholesalers significantly more productive. By offering an all-in-one AI sales platform, Distro enhances quoting accuracy, boosts conversion rates, and increases profit margins, all while ensuring exceptional customer experiences.

**Product Suite**

The platform boasts a robust suite of AI-driven tools designed to cater to the varying needs of the distribution industry:

1. **Distro RepBot**: An internal assistant that provides sales reps with immediate access to product and customer information.
   
2. **Distro CustomerBot**: An external-facing chatbot enhancing e-commerce capabilities by giving contractors quick access to order details and quote requests.

3. **Distro AutoBid**: A game-changer for processing bid lists and purchase orders, capable of interpreting documents in various formats to streamline quote generation.

4. **Distro QuoteTech**: Tailored for complex sales environments, this feature automates quoting processes to help sales reps close deals more efficiently.

5. **Custom AI Solutions**: Distro also collaborates with businesses to develop bespoke AI tools that address unique challenges, driving operational efficiency.

**Why Distro?**

What sets Distro apart is its singular focus on the wholesale distribution industry. Many AI solutions attempt to serve diverse sectors without specific tailoring; Distro, conversely, dedicates itself entirely to its niche. This focused approach enables it to offer deep insights and optimal efficiencies that resonate well with its target audience.

**Future Direction**

With the foundation laid and early successes already evident, Distro is poised for growth. It continues to refine its AI solutions, expand its capabilities, and most importantly, deliver exceptional value to its customers—empowering every participant in the distribution ecosystem to perform at their best.

In a world where AI is ubiquitous but often misaligned with specific industry needs, Distro stands out as a company genuinely committed to revolutionizing industrial sales through tailored technology. For further information or to get started, visit [Distro's website](https://distro.app).
